original_text: And he said to them, “The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them, and those in authority over them are called benefactors.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 이방인의 임금들은 그들을 주관하며 그 집권자들은 은인이라 칭함을 받으나

sentences.original_text: The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them,
and those in authority over them are called benefactors.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 권세 있는 자들은 익인이라 불리느니라.
